column4: can someone explain to me this.. i have a directory set at www-data:root and everything works fine my permisions are 777. even when i set the directory to root:root since I have 777 why does the program not function correctly and display chmod errors?
the httpd may complain that the permissions are *too* permissive.
and is your httpd actually running as www-data?
is the dir 777? or is everything inside it 777 also?
